name: Jeht
description:
This card will record the number of cards discarded from your Support Zone during this match as Sophistication points. (Max 6 points)
After your characters use an Elemental Burst: If this card has recorded at least 5 Sophistication points, discard this card and generate Omni Element equal to the number of Sophistication points minus 2.
descriptionraw: This card will record the number of cards discarded from your Support Zone during this match as Sophistication points. (Max 6 points)\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>After your characters use an Elemental Burst:</color> If this card has recorded at least 5 Sophistication points, discard this card and generate $[K411] equal to the number of <color=#FFFFFFFF>Sophistication points minus 2</color>.
descriptionreplaced: This card will record the number of cards discarded from your Support Zone during this match as Sophistication points. (Max 6 points)\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>After your characters use an Elemental Burst:</color> If this card has recorded at least 5 Sophistication points, discard this card and generate <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Element</color> equal to the number of <color=#FFFFFFFF>Sophistication points minus 2</color>.
storytext:
"Here's a thousand hugs! We will meet again!"
"May we meet again under a lovelier sun."
